page.title: 01GENERAL SURVEY
page.content: This area lies just South of the A5 (Watling Street) between {Atherstone}and{Nuneaton. { }There are several villages in this area:{Purley Chase,Ridge Lane, {Oldbury, Birchley Heath and Bentley. } These are small communities with few amenities. This is a rural area - consisiting mainly of{Farmland} (Arable and Dairy) and{Woodland. }Much of the land belongs to the {Merevale {Estate, }owned by Sir William Dugdale, and is let to tenant farmers. Other industries in the area, apart from{Farming,}are {Quarrying}at Mancetter and{Coalmining at Baddesley Colliery.
